# Visual inspection of movement syndromes

```{r}
# libs
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(colorspace)
```

## Read data

```{r}
data = fread("data/data_path_summaries.csv")
```

## Plot data

```{r}
labels_type = c(
  exploit = "Exploitation",
  interf = "Interference"
)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(g, nb_mu, group = g))+
  geom_bin2d(bins = c(14, 170))+
  scale_fill_viridis_c(
    option = "C", direction = 1,
    trans = "log10"
  )+
  scale_y_sqrt(
    limits = c(1, 10)
  )+
  theme_test()+
  facet_grid(
    type ~ rep_, 
    labeller = labeller(
      type = labels_type
    )
  )
```
